description: Microsoft has fixed two actively exploited zero-day vulnerabilities during the April 2024 Patch Tuesday, although the company failed to initially tag them as such. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes two Windows zero-days exploited in malware attacks

description: Threat actors can exploit a security vulnerability in the Rust standard library to target Windows systems in command injection attacks. [...]
title: Critical Rust flaw enables Windows command injection attacks

description: Microsoft has released the KB5036892 cumulative update for Windows 10 21H2 and Windows 10 22H2 with twenty-three changes and two new features. [...]
title: Windows 10 KB5036892 update released with 23 new fixes, changes

description: Non-profit healthcare service provider Group Health Cooperative of South Central Wisconsin (GHC-SCW) has disclosed that a ransomware gang breached its network in January and stole documents containing the personal and medical information of over 500,000 individuals. [...]
title: GHC-SCW: Ransomware gang stole health data of 533,000 people

description: Microsoft has released the KB5036893 cumulative update for Windows 11 23H3, which includes 29 changes and fixes and enables the Moment 5 features for every user. [...]
title: Windows 11 KB5036893 update released with 29 changes, Moment 5 features

description: Today is Microsoft's April 2024 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for 150 flaws and sixty-seven remote code execution bugs. [...]
title: Microsoft April 2024 Patch Tuesday fixes 150 security flaws, 67 RCEs

description: A Romanian botnet group named 'RUBYCARP' is leveraging known vulnerabilities and performing brute force attacks to breach corporate networks and compromise servers for financial gain. [...]
title: RUBYCARP hackers linked to 10-year-old cryptomining botnet

description: Maintaining visibility into container hosts, ensuring best practices, and conducting vulnerability assessments are necessary to ensure effective security. In this article Wazuh explores how its software can help implement best security practices for containerized environments. [...]
title: Implementing container security best practices using Wazuh

description: Researchers have discovered two techniques that could enable attackers to bypass audit logs or generate less severe entries when downloading files from SharePoint. [...]
title: New SharePoint flaws help hackers evade detection when stealing files

description: Security researchers at Bitdefender have discovered four vulnerabilities impacting multiple versions of WebOS, the operating system used in LG smart TVs. [...]
title: Over 90,000 LG Smart TVs may be exposed to remote attacks

description: Laptop and tablet accessories maker Targus disclosed that it suffered a cyberattack disrupting operations after a threat actor gained access to the company's file servers. [...]
title: Targus discloses cyberattack after hackers detected on file servers
